mhaeuser/Battery-Toolkit

Controls power state of Apple Silicon Macs

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • lets you set a battery charge limit on Apple Silicon Macs
  • macOS keyboard shortcuts and automation for power users
  • Tools to unlock battery management systems
  • Monitors macOS and iOS device power usage
  • terminal monitor for Apple Silicon CPU/GPU metrics and power consumption
  • Performance monitoring CLI tool for Apple Silicon
  • Home Assistant integration for tracking device battery types and replacement dates
  • Resources for Apple Silicon development and hardware
  • Automates macOS through keyboard, mouse, and screen control APIs
